sections.heading: Fee
sections.text: for issuance or renewal of license; disposition.

sections.heading: Administration
sections.text:
by Nevada Gaming Commission: Issuance of licenses; times and places for

wagering; regulations; authority and procedure for appointing Off-Track

Pari-Mutuel Wagering Committee; inspection of books and records of licensees.

sections.heading: Regulations
sections.text:
governing off-track pari-mutuel wagering; sharing of revenue; approval of

Commission.

sections.heading: Limitations
sections.text: on amount and division of commissions; payment and disposition of taxes.

sections.heading: Calculation
sections.text:
of monthly state license fee to include gross revenue from off-track

pari-mutuel wagering; calculation of gross revenue.

sections.heading: Place
sections.text: for conducting and public viewing of wagering.

sections.heading: Wagering
sections.text: outside enclosure or licensed establishment prohibited.

sections.heading: Limitation
sections.text: on wager by agent; off-track wagering by agent prohibited.

sections.heading: Altering
sections.text: value of wager for patron prohibited; regulations; exemptions.

sections.heading: Suspension
sections.text: or revocation of license: Hearing; judicial review.
